userId.label: userId
userId.notProvided: The userId field is required but was not provided.
userId.invalidType: The userId field does not contain valid data. This field must be a numeric value.

username.label: username
username.notProvided: The username field is required but was not provided.
username.invalidType: The username field does not contain valid data. This field must be a string value.
username.invalidLength: The username field is too long. This field must be no more than 20 bytes long.
username.duplicateName: The provided username has already been used.
